item.description:
As predicted, April Meetup was best yet, with 25 people. Now I predict that May will be even better. Ron ranere was a fabulous host at his photography studio. And Ron said he'll do it again for May!!!
We started many great solutions for success in our difficult industry, and by May, we expect that these solutions will be structured as a foundation for us.
Please come and help us & you succeed.

Venue is again at Ron Ranere's "Positive Image" photography studio. A great place, and a great host.

For more information, see http://www.shirleywil...
item.name: The Boston Fashion Industry May Meetup
